# PHP教程从零开始学设计模式（千峰教育）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/php-jiaocheng-conglingkaishi-xue-shejimoshi-qianfeng-jiaoyu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/php-jiaocheng-conglingkaishi-xue-shejimoshi-qianfeng-jiaoyu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install php-jiaocheng-conglingkaishi-xue-shejimoshi-qianfeng-jiaoyu
php-jiaocheng-conglingkaishi-xue-shejimoshi-qianfeng-jiaoyu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g php-jiaocheng-conglingkaishi-xue-shejimoshi-qianfeng-jiaoyu
php-jiaocheng-conglingkaishi-xue-shejimoshi-qianfeng-jiaoyu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
